name: Bulk Naturals Wholesale - Safflower Oil
description: Bulk Naturals Wholesale is a natural oils supplier offering cold-pressed Safflower Oil in two varieties: High-Oleic (10.2g monounsaturated fat per serving) and High-Linoleic (72.31% linoleic acid, 16% oleic acid). Both varieties provide natural sources of essential fatty acids for barrier repair, moisturizing, and carrier oil applications.
products: Safflower Oil - High-Linoleic (72.31% linoleic acid, 16% oleic acid)
notes: Natural oils supplier specializing in bulk wholesale. Offers two cold-pressed safflower oil varieties for different formulation needs: High-Oleic (penetration enhancer focus) and High-Linoleic (essential fatty acid focus with 72.31% linoleic acid). Natural source of fatty acids for barrier repair and moisturizing. Ideal carrier oil for lipid-rich formulations requiring natural, plant-based fatty acid sources.
